full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 101 of 197 2642
LCHCmax3 Dubin - direct
Government Exhibit 241, the photograph that is closest to the foreground in the picture.
BY MR. PAGLIUCA:
Q. Do you see that, Dr. Dubin?
A. I do.
Q. Do you recognize anyone in that expanded part of exhibit 241?
MS. MOE: I'm sorry, your Honor, the question is without saying that person's name. I just wanted to make sure that was clear.
Q. The question was very simple. Do you recognize anyone?
A. I do.
Q. Okay. Do you recognize one or two people in that photograph?
A. Two people.
Q. And without saying -- well, is one of the people Mr. Epstein?
A. That's correct.
Q. And without saying the name of the other person, is the other person one of your children?
A. Yes.
Q. Okay. And in terms of the age range, do you recall whether this is your now 27, 25, or 20?
A. The 20.
Q. I'm assuming you were aware that Mr. Epstein had this
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00014207
